nodes.text: Essay-Emthree was a droid and close companion of K'cri Elban from their time together during the Clone Wars. His vocabulator was damaged during the war, and Essay preferred the deeper, rougher tone to his voice and never got it fixed. During the Galactic Civil War, he played an ancient stand up synthtone and sung songs from the days of the Galactic Republic at Elban's establishment, K'cri's Cafe.
